title: Platinum I Player looking for Ranked 5s Team
body:
Hi guys, I'm a Platinum I player and I am looking for a ranked 5s team to play with (looking to get those tasty season rewards). Prefer a casual/semi competitive team that plays ranked 5s often, with individual members being above Gold.
I mainly play Top, Jungle and Mid.

replies.body:
Hi there I'm James and I'm making The Chiefs Team v2, I'm 11 years old but I have a big excited attitude to the game and while our roster is Bronze 5-3, we can assure you that our team mechanics are at least Diamond (we stole The Chiefs name, but don't tell them).

Would be nice to teach a Diamond player some tips in macro play. Add me.
+1 good banter and extremely skilled and great to work with.
+1, His a great player, good attitude and gr8 top laner
